snippet.title: Drop Duchy - Coming Early 2025
snippet.description:
Wishlist Drop Duchy on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2525310/Drop_Duchy/

Dive further into Drop Duchy's unique gameplay with a new trailer showcasing a refreshing blend of iconic puzzle mechanics and strategic resource management. 

In Drop Duchy, expand and fortify your realm by strategically placing blocks of land and structures that synergize with each other. Collect resources, unlock new cards, and master new mechanics each run as you prepare to face ruthless battles for conquest. Customize your deck to best suit your strategy, choosing from more than 80 unique cards while helping your fledgling realm flourish.

Your reign begins in 2025 when Drop Duchy releases on Steam!

https://x.com/SleepyMillGames
https://x.com/TheArcadeCrew

©The Arcade Crew - Sleepy Mill Studio - 2024, all rights reserved.
